entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13 except minus 7 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 except minus 7 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3 except 7 near the Alberta border.
